meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound found in certain plants.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the emodins in the plant to understand its properties.
meanings.sent2: The emodins extracted from the leaves were used in the laboratory experiment.
meanings.sent3: The emodins in the flower seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The emodins acted like tiny warriors fighting off pests in the plant.
meanings.sent5: The bright green color of the emodins made them easy to spot in the plant.
